profile_positions.title: Director BU Farmer & Veterinarian Products and Services

profile_positions.description:
- Overseeing the Ruminant team (fifty employees, turnover EUR 30 million)
- Account Manager Dairy Industry
- Member Management Team GD Animal Health 

Accomplishments at GD: 
-	Improving efficiency resulting in a higher turnover and higher margins 
-	Initiator of a cultural change resulting in a shorter time to market and improvement of employee performance
-	Functional system owner VeeOnline, the major Animal Health application of GD
-	Functional system owner SharePoint
profile_positions.title: Manager Department of Bovine

profile_positions.description:
Accomplishments at GD:
-	Designer of the corporate communication plan. Part of this plan was redefining the mission statement of GD (‘Teaming up for animal health, in the interest of animals, their owners and society at large’).
-	Involved in the communication of the GD Strategy
-	Leading SWOT sessions
-	Introducing the main aspects of marketing at GD
-	Initiator new website (www.gddiergezondheid.nl and www.gdanimalhealth.com)
-	Initiator GD Academy
-	Initiator new web shop
profile_positions.title: Hoofd Marketingsupport en Communicatie.

profile_positions.description:
Team Manager Agri Offices AB Oost in Rijssen, Doetinchem and Huissen
-Manager of three sales teams (turnover amounts to EUR 30 million) consisting of thirty employees in total, including salesmen, HRM specialists and planners. Through these three sales teams, on average thousand employees were working on a temporary or permanent base for AB Oost’s customers. AB Oost is specialised in human resource services for customers, mainly acting in the agricultural business. 

AB Oost is een cooperatieve onderneming met 13.000 leden en een omzet van 130 miljoen in uitzenden en detacheren en het leveren van HR diensten. De provincies Drenthe, Overijssel, Flevoland en Gelderland vormen ons werkgebied. Dagelijks zijn er 4500 medewerkers actief in de agrarische sector, waaronder de melkvee-, varkens- en pluimveehouderij, tuinbouw en akkerbouw en de deelmarkten Bouw/Gww, Groen/Semi-overheid, Agribusiness/Industrie, Transport/Logistiek en Techniek. Daarnaast bieden we onze leden ook dienstverlening o.a. met verzekeringsproducten, thuiszorgdiensten.
profile_positions.title: Regio Manager Agri provinces Gelderland and Overijssel (offices in Huissen, Doetinchem, Rijssen)

profile_positions.description:
Product manager/ Marketing manager AB Oost, based at the headquarters in Almen

Roles and accomplishments at AB Oost:
-	Member of the AB National Combat Team Animal diseases
-	Introducing the main aspects of marketing at the company
-	Implementing BrandKey AB Oost
-	Turning specialistic services, such as claw health services and poultry services, into profitable parts of the company


AB Oost is een cooperatieve onderneming met 13.000 leden en een omzet van 130 miljoen in uitzenden en detacheren en het leveren van HR diensten. De provincies Drenthe, Overijssel, Flevoland en Gelderland vormen ons werkgebied. Dagelijks zijn er 4500 medewerkers actief in de agrarische sector, waaronder de melkvee-, varkens- en pluimveehouderij, tuinbouw en akkerbouw en de deelmarkten Bouw/Gww, Groen/Semi-overheid, Agribusiness/Industrie, Transport/Logistiek en Techniek. Daarnaast bieden we onze leden ook dienstverlening o.a. met verzekeringsproducten, thuiszorgdiensten.

profile_positions.description: Veeteelt is a magazine of CRV Holding (formerly NRS, Holland Genetics, CR Delta), published in The Netherlands and Belgium. The magazine is writing about the Dairy industry
